properties.description: Whether window has native frame, default is `true`.
properties.name: frame

properties.description:
Whether window is transparent, default is `false`.

Only frameless window can be transparent, the behavior of making a normal
window transparent is undefined.
properties.name: transparent

properties.description:
Whether to show window buttons for frameless window, default is `false`.

This property is ignored for normal windows.
properties.name: show_traffic_lights
